product_name: Jagwire Disc Brake Pads for Hayes Brakes
long_description: These replacement disk brake pads from Jagwire are designed to be used with Hayes disk brakes. HeatShield(R) technology resists heat buildup; brakes stay cool and improve control in critical situations. Special compound minimizes squeal when braking. Set of two. Compatible with Hayes MX-2, MX-3 and Sole models.
short_description: These replacement disk brake pads from Jagwire are designed to be used with Hayes disk brakes.
